title: Ever notice how Ziggs has unrealistically perfect teeth for a yordle?
body:
seriously, it almost looks weird on him when you look close enough. Yordles are supposed to be animal-furry creature things, right? (at least the males are)

Those look like human teeth. It weirds me out.{{champion:115}}

replies.body: he's a Cheshire cat
You have to appreciate a guy who cares about his oral hygiene
Ziggs is single, he's trying to be more attractive to the female yordles.
I always kind of imagine ziggs is really funny, in a sort of quirky way. You know, like, fun to be around socialite, mind-going-a-mile-a-minute type. He just gets distracted easily.

I agree! He's probably a really fun dude to hang out with but also the type of character your parents always worried about. "If you friends jumped off a bridge would you do it too?" But in this case... bombs
He probably didn't go over so well the first time she brought him home to momma and daddy, although i would have loved to be at that dinner table.
Sounds like me when I'm at a really late night party...

> [{quoted}](name=CubedJustice,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,crdiscussion-id=hKRAKVvc,comment-6
?id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-04-10T23:16:59.116+M0000)
>
> Ziggs is single, he's trying to be more attractive to the female yordles.

Little does he know, he attracted Jinx with those pearly whites. Girl really likes a guy who can smile and blow things up.
orthodontists hate him

http://i.ytimg.com/vi/RSOF1pVdb0w/hqdefault.jpg

Look familiar?
So an advanced animal species isn't allowed to have good hygiene?

http://www.lolking.net/models.php/?champion=115&skin=4
Snow Day Ziggs in Lolking's model viewer.
Try the Critical Attack animation.
[I... I see.](http://prntscr.com/6sbnfg)
just whatever you do, don't look at Zac
I feel so stupid, but I just sat there laughing at it for a good minute. why is it so dang funny lmao.

My theory is: Ziggs experiments with various types of explosives and since he's always grinning due to his maniacal genius, when the explosives go off some of the chemicals get on his teeth and have a positive side effect of shining his teeth. Negative side effects are still unknown.
He lost his teeth from eating bombs. He actually has dentures.
His teeth are like that in order to be cartoonish type.

So just because Ziggs has excellent personal hygiene he is now creepy? Yordles are furry, yes, but since when does having fur make you not allowed to have nice teeth? Chimps are furry as well, but their teeth look almost human, and this whole game is entirely made up to begin with, so whose to say that Yordles can't be furry and have a nice set of chompers? Heimer has nice teeth, Rumble has a small set, but his also look nice, Teemo and veigar never show their teeth, and Gnar is a prehistoric Yordle and his teeth look animalistic for that reason.
How do you feel about the british?

B-but he lacks canines! That makes him different from a human!

TBH I think its a reference to Alice in Wonderland
Perfect teeth on Ziggs is not a problem lol
